page.title: 20MUILEANN BEAG-BROADFORD
page.content: {The Muileann Beag(Little Mill)}was once a flour mill but now sells woollens.It is basically of two rooms one of which serves as a coffee shop. The Mill shop is busiest in July and August and closes for the winter.Two of a staff man the shop.The jumpers and other woollen goods are made at Isleornsay in Sleat and the coffee shop sells coffee,tea and home bakes. {-------------------------------------- { CREDITS:}mr wyness{annie macinnes} stephen orrick{robin williams}alan macrae{mark fraser}christine western{ {keri simpson}angus smith{myles {macinnes}ross nicolson{lachie {mackinnon}donald macsween{george {robertson}craig finlayson{emma bruce} rhoda cameron{jackie macleod}sally moore-all of{Primary 7}Bun Sgoil an Ath Leathainn.
